wikipedia_page.main: Maggie Gray is an English set decorator. She was nominated for an Academy Award in the category Best Art Direction for the film Brazil and again in 2010 for her work in The Young Victoria. In addition, she won an Emmy Award for The Young Indiana Jones Chronicles.

link_mentions.page: Academy Award for Best Production Design

response: The film was nominated for two Academy Awards, for Best Original Screenplay and Best Art Direction (Norman Garwood, Maggie Gray).
**Brazil – Art Direction: Norman Garwood; Set Decoration: Maggie Gray
** The Young Victoria – Art Direction: Patrice Vermette; Set Decoration: Maggie Gray
